meanings.definition: Complete or thorough in every detail or aspect.
meanings.sent1: She was a thoroughgoing student, always completing her assignments meticulously.
meanings.sent2: The detective's thoroughgoing investigation left no stone unturned.
meanings.sent3: The chef's thoroughgoing dedication to perfecting his recipes paid off with a Michelin star.
meanings.sent4: His thoroughgoing commitment to environmental conservation was like a beacon in the community.
meanings.sent5: The artist's thoroughgoing attention to color and light made her paintings come alive.

meanings.definition: Carried out to the full extent; exhaustive.
meanings.sent1: The team's thoroughgoing effort in the tournament earned them the championship.
meanings.sent2: The scientist conducted a thoroughgoing study on the effects of climate change.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's thoroughgoing exploration of the playground left no slide untested.
meanings.sent4: Her thoroughgoing cleaning of the house made it sparkle like never before.
meanings.sent5: The author's thoroughgoing research for the book took her to libraries around the world.

meanings.definition: Holding or adhering to a particular belief or ideology without compromise.
meanings.sent1: He was a thoroughgoing supporter of human rights, always standing up for justice.
meanings.sent2: The politician's thoroughgoing dedication to her constituents earned her their trust.
meanings.sent3: The cat was a thoroughgoing fan of tuna, refusing any other food.
meanings.sent4: Her thoroughgoing loyalty to her friends was unwavering in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's thoroughgoing commitment to training was evident in her performance on the field.
